features.name: Email parsing with postal-mime
features.description: Parse incoming emails using postal-mime library. Extract from, to, subject, date, messageId, html, and text content.

features.name: HTML to Markdown conversion
features.description: Convert HTML email bodies to Markdown using turndown library. Handle common email formatting (bold, italic, links, lists).

features.name: Email source detection
features.description: Detect email source (Gmail, Outlook, iCloud) from headers. Set source field in note frontmatter.

features.name: Markdown note generation
features.description: Generate complete markdown note with YAML frontmatter, tasks section, email content, and notes section.

features.name: Filename generation and sanitization
features.description: Generate safe filenames from date and subject. Handle special characters, length limits, cross-platform compatibility.

features.name: R2 bucket write with deduplication
features.description: Write notes to R2 bucket. Check for existing files to prevent duplicates. Use email_id in metadata.

features.name: Error handling and logging
features.description: Comprehensive error handling. Log errors without exposing sensitive data. Don't bounce emails on processing errors.

features.name: End-to-end integration test
features.description: Test complete flow: receive email → parse → convert → write to R2. Verify note format and content.
